refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns the timezone offset from GMT

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
intDateTimeZone::getOffset DateTimedatetime
inttimezone_offset_get DateTimeZoneobject DateTimedatetime
This function returns the offset to GMT for the date/time specified in the datetime parameter. The GMT offset is calculated with the timezone information contained in the DateTimeZone object being used.

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns time zone offset in seconds on success&return.falseforfailure;.
